modalLogic.tableau
Class DynamicBacktracking<P>

java.lang.Object
  modalLogic.tableau.DynamicBacktracking<P>

public class DynamicBacktracking<P>
extends java.lang.Object

Performs dynamic backtracking when clash occurs on current branch.
